Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.commands

Class SingleArgumentCommand<T>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.commands.AbstractCommand
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.commands.SingleArgumentCommand<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the final type of the argument
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserCommand
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChooseMageCommand, MoveMnCommand, MoveStudentCommand, PickCloudCommand, PlayAssistantsCommand, PlayCharacterCommand
abstract class SingleArgumentCommand<T> extends AbstractCommand
Abstract command that takes 1 argument from a list of arguments.

  • Constructor Details

    • SingleArgumentCommand

      SingleArgumentCommand(com.google.gson.JsonObject cmd, UserCommandType type, Function<com.google.gson.JsonElement,T> extractor)
      Creates a new SingleArgumentCommand from the specified JsonObject. The JsonObject must have the following properties:
      • type must be equal to the specified one
      • username must be a non-null string
      • gameId must be a Number
      • arguments must be an array of strings with at least one value
      Parameters:
      cmd - the JsonObject from which to create the command
      type - the value that the type property of cmd must have
      extractor - a Function that converts a JsonElement into the desired type. In case it cannot convert the value, it must throw IllegalArgumentException.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null or cmd is not formatted correctly

  • Method Details
